timeline.bodyText: kafka offset is not a very good term to be used for describing the index of a message within a log stream. Instead, I would suggest calling it index or logIndex similar to the term used in the Raft algorithm (https://cs.stackexchange.com/questions/97542/raft-algorithm-whats-the-meaning-of-concept-index).
